vivo T1 Pro 5G and T1 44W are segment-defining smartphones, here are 5 reasons why you should buy them

By
Brand Story
-
Published On: May 5, 2022 | Last Updated: May 5, 2022

The new vivo T1 Pro 5G and T1 44W have caused an upheaval in the smartphone market with their arrival. The two phones come bearing premium designs and offer top-notch specs and competitive pricing. The vivo T1 Pro 5G will be available for pre-booking from 5th May and will go on first sale starting 7th May at 12 midnight, whereas T1 44W will go on sale from 8th May 2022 at 12 noon onwards. So, we have decided to take a deep dive into their offerings to give you five reasons why we think they are the turbo performers in their segment and why you should buy them.

Top-notch performance

Both vivo T1 Pro 5G and T1 44W smartphones offer excellent performance. While the vivo T1 Pro 5G comes with the Snapdragon 778G chipset, the vivo T1 44W has opted for the Snapdragon 680 variant. Compared to their respective predecessors, these SoCs offer significant drops in their power consumption levels and equally significant increases in their performance.

The vivo T1 Pro 5G’s Snapdragon 778G 2.4GHz octa-core processor comprises Kryo 670 CPU cores, which give it 40 percent better performance. It also packs the Adreno 642L GPU that guarantees 40 percent faster graphics rendering. The Snapdragon 778G is also a 5G capable chipset, which means you will be ready for the next generation of connectivity when the 5G network deploys in India. As for the T1 44W, its 2.4GHz octa-core processor consists of Kryo 265 cores and the Adreno 610 GPU that bring a 20 percent increase in CPU performance and a 10 percent increase in GPU performance.
These improvements ensure that both the phones can breeze through everyday tasks and even handle high-end games without any hitches. These powerful chipsets are coupled with ample RAM to ensure smooth multitasking. The T1 Pro ships with either 6GB or 8GB of RAM, whereas the T1 44W comes with 4GB, 6GB or 8GB RAM. The phones also feature Extended RAM technology, which allows the phones to convert 4GB of storage into additional RAM on command. That means a maximum of 12GB of RAM is accessible on both phones.
Being the more advanced of the two devices, the T1 Pro 5G also receives a flagship-level 8 Layer Liquid Cooling solution. This industry-leading VC technology brings an innovative heat dissipation design that ensures consistent performance, even during long and intense gaming sessions.

Splendid cameras to capture your perfect moments

vivo phones are known for their camera prowess, and these phones are no different. The vivo T1 Pro 5G comes with the company’s AI Triple Camera setup, which includes a 64MP main sensor, an 8MP ultra-wide camera, and a 2MP Macro shooter. The main camera does incredibly well in daylight scenarios, capturing even minute details and delivering excellent dynamic range. Its large f/1.79 aperture ensures that low-light images have ample details, making the phone a great companion for late-night outings. These images are also aided by vivo’s Super Night Mode, which denoises the images and subtly adds light to your nighttime shots to make them look professional and beautiful.

The T1 Pro 5G’s 8MP ultra-wide camera boasts a 117-degree field of view that gives a completely new perspective to whatever subject you’re photographing. The same goes for its Macro camera, which lets you get as close as 4cms to your subjects. This phone also comes with 4K video recording support and a 16MP selfie camera.

As for the vivo T1 44W, it sports a Multi-Scenario Rear Camera System featuring a 50MP primary camera and 2MP Macro and depth sensors. The high-resolution primary camera can capture rich details. vivo’s Super Night Mode is also present here, allowing you to capture glorious nighttime shots. The 2MP Macro and depth sensors do their job beautifully as well. Like the T1 Pro 5G, this phone also sports a 16MP front camera.

With these phones, you also get vivo’s renowned camera features like Video Super Stabilisation, Dual-View Video, AI Beauty, and Night Filters. These features enhance the camera experience and help you capture images that otherwise would not have been possible.

Beautiful displays

Both the phones pack a 6.44-inch AMOLED display with FHD+ resolution. The displays cover the DCI-P3 colour gamut, so everything looks colour accurate. Moreover, both displays offer 180Hz touch sampling rates for aiding gamers. These aspects guarantee that you will have a fantabulous experience watching content and interacting with the displays.

That said, the display on the T1 Pro 5G has a few more aces up its sleeve. Firstly, it’s got a higher 90Hz refresh rate that enables silky smooth scrolling and buttery transitions. And its peak brightness of 1300 nits means that it’s HDR10+ certified, making it ideal for viewing HDR movies and TV shows.

It also has a 6 million:1 contrast ratio, rendering vivid colours lifelike graphics, and razor-sharp texts. Lastly, it’s got an SGS Eye Care Display certification that lets you enjoy long hours of viewing content without feeling a strain on your eyes.

Long battery life along with fast charging

Large batteries have become more common in smartphones these days, but not all phones in the price segments of these devices offer such high-end fast charging technologies. This is yet another attribute of the vivo T1 Pro 5G and the vivo T1 44W that sets them apart. The T1 Pro 5G features a 4,700mAh battery that guarantees a full day’s usage with ease. Its big battery is complemented by vivo’s 66W FlashCharge technology that can charge the device to 50 percent in just 18 minutes.

And as its name indicates, the T1 44W comes with 44W FlashCharge support and has a slightly larger 5,000mAh battery. This charging technology can give it 50 percent of juice in just 28 minutes. It also gets a feature called VEG (vivo Energy Guardian) to help reduce power consumption so you can stay connected the entire day on a single complete charge.

Exquisite designs

When it comes to design, both phones strike the perfect balance between beauty and ergonomics. The T1 Pro 5G comes with what vivo calls the Turbo Engine Design, which adds 3D curves that allow it to fit snugly in your hand. The two large camera lenses are designed to look like aeroplane engines, keeping with the Turbo Engine Design aesthetics. Additionally, the rear surface gets a glitter AG texture and 400nm super-strong nano-coating, contributing to its grip and dazzling appearance.

Coming to the vivo T1 44W, it also gets 3D curves on its back surface for delivering comfortable touch and a snug grip. The large camera housings from the Turbo Engine Design are present here, and so is the upgraded AG Texture design. While the T1 Pro 5G is available in Turbo Black and Turbo Cyan colours, the T1 44W comes dressed in Midnight Galaxy, Starry Sky, and Ice Dawn shades.
The vivo T1 Pro 5G is now available for pre-booking and will go on sale from May 7th (12 midnight) onwards. Its 6GB + 128GB variant will cost Rs 23,999, while its 8GB + 128GB version will go for Rs 24,999. The vivo T1 44W is also available for pre-booking and will go on sale from May 8th (12 noon). Its three models include a 4GB + 128GB variant costing Rs 14,499, a 6GB + 128GB variant costing Rs 15,999, and a 8GB + 128GB variant costing Rs 17,999. Discounts of up to Rs 2,500 (T1 Pro 5G) and Rs 1,500 (T1 44W) will be available on select credit and debit cards till May 31st. So, don’t forget to buy these phones before May 31st to get the best pricing.
